verses.content: LALPA chu inpâk ro, Ei Pathien inpâkna hla sak hi a ṭha sih a; Chu chu ân hawiin, inpâk hi a âwm hrim a nih.
LALPA chun Jerusalem chu ân ngîr nâwk a. Israel hnawtsuoka umhai chu a ṭhuoi khâwm nâwk a.
Lungriem ithlâkhai chu a sukdam a, An hliemnahai chu a tuom hlak a.
Arasi tam chin a tiem a, An hming ân bûk seng tâwl hlak a.
Ei LALPA chu a ropui a, thilthawthei tienga khawm hrâttak a nih, A varna chun tâwpintai a nei nawh.
LALPA chun thuhnuoirawlhai chu a chel zing a, Mi rilohai chu hnuoiah a pei thlâk hlak.
Lâwmthu hrila LALPA chawimawiin hla sak unla, Ṭingṭang leh ei Pathien inpâkin hla sak ro.
Ama chun vân khi sûm ân zâm hlietir a, Leihnuoi ta dingin ruo a buotsai a, Tlângahai chun hlobet ân mâwngtir hlak.
Ama chun sa kuomah a fâk ding a pêk hlak a, Vaâk tê inhrâm inhrâmhai kuoma leh.
Ama chu sakawr hrâtna chunga chun a lâwm nawh a, Mihriem kehai chunga khawm lâwmna hrim hrim a nei ngai nawh.
LALPA chun ama ṭituhai chunga chun lâwmna a nei hlak, A ngilneina beiseituhai chunga chun.
Aw Jerusalem, LALPA chu inpâk rawh, Aw Zion, i Pathien chu inpâk rawh.
Ama chun i kul kawtkhârhai kalna thingtluonhai chu a sukngar a, I sûnga i nau le te umhai chu mal a sâwm sih a.
I ramri sûnga chun inremna a siem a, Bu ṭhatak chiin a suksip hlak che a nih.
A thupêk chu hnuoia hin a tir suok a, A thu chu hrâttakin a tlân hlak.
Vûr sûr chu berâm hmul angin a pêk a, Vûr tla chu vut angin a the dar hlak.
A tui inkhal chu bei nawi hlek angin a pei suok a. A dei chu tuin am tuor thei a ta?
A thu chu a tir suok a, chuong chu a suktui a, A thli ân hrângtir a; chuongchun, tuihai chu a hung luong hlak.
A thu chu Jakobhai kuomah ân langtir a, A thuruothai le a rorêlhai khawm chu Israelhai kuomah ân langtir a.
Ama chun ieng hnam chunga khawm chuong ang chun a thaw ngai nawh: A rorêlhai hlak chu an hriet bawk nawh. LALPA chu inpâk ro.
